{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Toshiba |model=WRC-1000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/30/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RT192W-D4 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=H8NWLL030M |ic_id=1353A-WLL030 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DB-90EI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Vanguard |ram1_model=VG36641641DT-7L |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Askey WLL030M |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3874 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WRC_Network |default_ssid_regex=^WRC_Network$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:90:96 |oui_eth=00:90:96 |default_ch= }} [http://209.167.114.38/support/Download/files_Downloads/Index/WirelessProducts/wrc1000en.htm Manual on Toshiba's site]
The power adapter included with the device is a '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-10SB REV.F (5V, 2A).
